title: Advanced Homepage - Huffie
description: This challenge will put your HTML and CSS skills to test. The challenge is to create a more complex homepage with different sections that you will have to use all HTML, CSS skills

userStories.content: Create a testimonial page that matches the given design.
Use HTML to create basic structure.
Add logo, title, descriptions, buttons, images,... according to the design.
Use CSS to style the card.
The page should be responsive on different screen sizes.
